properties.entry: SELECT CAFE_NO, CAFE_NAME, ADDRESS FROM CAFE_INFO JOIN LOCATION USING(LOCATION_CODE) WHERE LOCATION_NAME = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT (SUM(TASTE)/COUNT(*) + SUM(PRICE)/COUNT(*) + SUM(VIBE)/COUNT(*) + SUM(ACCESSIBILITY)/COUNT(*))/4 SCORE FROM SCORE WHERE CAFE_NO = ? GROUP BY CAFE_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAFE_REPLY WHERE CAFE_NO = ? GROUP BY CAFE_NO
SELECT CAFE_FILE_NO, CAFE_REF_NO, FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM CAFE_ATTACHMENT WHERE CAFE_REF_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CAFE_NO, CAFE_NAME, OPERATION_TIME, OFF_DAY, PHONE, ADDRESS, COUNT FROM CAFE_INFO WHERE ADDRESS = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCORE WHERE CAFE_NO = ?
SELECT MENU_NAME, CAFE_PRICE FROM CAFE_MENU WHERE CAFE_NO = ?
SELECT CAFE_FILE_NO, CAFE_REF_NO, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "DETAILIMG" FROM CAFE_ATTACHMENT WHERE CAFE_REF_NO = ? AND TYPE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CHANGE_NAME FROM CAFE_ATTACHMENT WHERE CAFE_REF_NO = ? AND TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CAFE_REPLY_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CAFE_REPLY_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM CAFE_REPLY C JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.CAFE_REPLY_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE CAFE_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO FROM SCORE WHERE USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO SCORE(CAFE_NO, USER_NO, TASTE, PRICE, VIBE, ACCESSIBILITY) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE SCORE SET TASTE = ?, PRICE = ?, VIBE = ?, ACCESSIBILITY = ? WHERE CAFE_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO CAFE_REPLY(CAFE_REPLY_NO, CAFE_NO, CAFE_REPLY_WRITER, CAFE_REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_CRNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO REPORT(REPORT_NO, USER_ID, CATEGORY, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE CAFE_INFO SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE ADDRESS = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE CAFE_INFO SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE ADDRESS = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE CAFE_REPLY SET CAFE_REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE CAFE_REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE CAFE_REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE CAFE_REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE CAFE_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE CAFE_FILE_NO = ?
UPDATE CAFE_INFO SET CAFE_NAME = ?, OPERATION_TIME = ?, OFF_DAY = ?, PHONE = ?, ADDRESS = ? WHERE CAFE_NO = ?
